Room.Name: Oceanview Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Oceanview Drive, just west of the Police Headquarters.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side of the road is the City Guard Crime Patrol Headquarters, where a number of rough looking guards walk in and out of the building. On the west side of the road is the Oceancrest Detention and Rehabilitation Facility where criminals and other vagrants are "rehabilitated" into useful contributors to society.
